definition: official records/grade (of goods)/file/records/shelves/slot/gap/crosspiece/classifier for crosspieces/classifier for events, affairs etc/Taiwan pr. [dang3]
Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]

sentences.english: Use a paper clip to hold this file together.
sentences.chinese: 用一個回形針把這份檔案夾起來。

sentences.english: How can you find your files when your desk is so messy ?
sentences.chinese: 你的書桌這麼凌亂，你要怎麼找到你的檔案夾呢？

sentences.english: Find article banks and file info in a folder.
sentences.chinese: 文章認爲，銀行在檔案夾信息。

sentences.english: I would like to buy a file holder, can you give a recommendation?
sentences.chinese: 我想買個檔案夾，你有推薦的嗎？

sentences.english: Could you please drop the folders off at our reception desk?
sentences.chinese: 可不可以麻煩您把檔案夾放在我們的櫃檯？

sentences.english: Please bring the red binder back next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 下週一請帶紅色檔案夾回學校。

sentences.english: I bought ten file folders yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我買了十個檔案夾。

sentences.english: The way of sorting can be changed via menu "View -> Sort by".
sentences.chinese: 因此，你可以非常快改變選定子檔案夾並顯示。
